read file and save to myData

```{r}
myData <- read.csv(file="activity.csv", sep=",",header=T)
usethis <- myData

```
change interval format

'''{r}
usethismin <- as.numeric(sprintf("%04.0f",usethis[,3]))
usethismin <- sprintf("%02.0f:%02.0f",usethismin%/%100,usethismin%%100) #, usethismin[,3]/100%%10000)
'''
cbind dateTime and convert it to Time

'''{r}
usethis <-  cbind(usethis, usethismin)
dateTime <- as.character(paste(as.character(usethis[,2]), usethis[,4], sep=" "))
dateTime <- strptime(dateTime, "%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S")
usethis <-  cbind(usethis, dateTime)
'''
subset weekday and weekend

'''{r}
weekday <- weekdays(as.Date(usethis[,5]))
we<-subset(usethis, usethis[,6]=="Saturday"|usethis[,6]=="Sunday")
wd <-subset(usethis, usethis[,6]!="Saturday"&usethis[,6]!="Sunday")
'''
show hist by days of the week(only complete cases)
'''{r}
library(lattice)
usethis1 <- usethis[complete.cases(usethis),]
histogram(~ steps | weekday, data=usethis1)

usethis2 <-transform(usethis1, factor(usethis1$weekday))
'''
mean an dmedian by the seekdays
'''{r}
aggregate(steps~weekday, usethis1, mean)
aggregate(steps~weekday, usethis1, median)
'''
find the max steps internal 
'''{r}
steps <- aggregate(steps~interval, usethis1, mean)
max <- steps[which.max(steps$steps), ]
max
'''
check with histogram
'''{r}
histogram(steps~interval, data=usethis1)
'''
number of NAs
'''{r}
sum(is.na(usethis))
'''
weekend hist of mean steps by interval
'''{r}
stepswe <- aggregate(steps~interval, we, mean)
histogram(steps ~ interval, data=stepswe)
'''
weekdays hist of mean steps by interval
'''{r}
stepswd <- aggregate(steps~interval, wd, mean)
histogram(steps ~ interval, data=stepswd)
